coded by:-w0rm
*/
#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <algorithm>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cctype>
#include <string>
#include <cstring>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>

using namespace std;

# define pb push_back
# define sz(a) int((a).size()) 
# define all(c) (c).begin(),(c).end() 
# define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<b;i++)
# define REP(i,a,b) for(i=a;i>=b;i--)
# define MP(X,Y) make_pair(X,Y)
# define LEN(X) ((int)(X.length()))
# define getINT(f) scanf("%d",&f)


const double pi=acos(-1.0);
const double eps=1e-11;

int main()
{
	//freopen("input","rt",stdin);
	//freopen("output","wt",stdout);
	
	int m,n,i,j,kase;
	char ch;
	for(kase=1;scanf("%d%d\n",&m,&n);kase++)
	{
		if(m==0 && n==0)return 0;
		int ans[m][n];
		char M[m][n];
			
		string s;
		memset(M,'.',sizeof(M));
		FOR(i,0,m)
		{
			j=0;
			getline(cin,s,'\n');
			stringstream ss(s);
			while(ss>>ch)M[i][j++]=ch;
		}		
		FOR(i,0,m)
		{
			FOR(j,0,n)
			{
				int cnt=0;
				if(M[i][j]=='*'){ans[i][j]=-1;continue;}
				if(i+1 < m)if(M[i+1][j]=='*')cnt++;
				if(j+1 < n)if(M[i][j+1]=='*')cnt++;
				if(i-1>=0 )if(M[i-1][j]=='*')cnt++;
				if(j-1>=0 )if(M[i][j-1]=='*')cnt++;
				if(i-1>=0 && j-1 >=0)if(M[i-1][j-1]=='*')cnt++;
				if(i+1 <m && j+1 <n)if(M[i+1][j+1]=='*')cnt++;
				if(i+1 <m && j-1 >=0)if(M[i+1][j-1]=='*')cnt++;
				if(i-1>=0 && j+1 <n)if(M[i-1][j+1]=='*')cnt++;
				ans[i][j]=(cnt);
			}
		}
		printf("Field #%d:\n",kase);
		FOR(i,0,m)
		{
			FOR(j,0,n)
			{
				if(ans[i][j]==-1)cout<<"*";
				else printf("%d",ans[i][j]);
			}
			printf("\n");
		}
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
